flawed_nl_solution:
There are thirty games in the season because 20 + 10 = <<20+10=30>>30
He needs to get 90 hits on the year to average 3 hits a game because 30 x 3 = <<90=90>>90
He has 40 hits already because 20 x 2 = <<20*2=40>>40
He needs 60 hits in the final 10 games because 90 - 40 = <<90-40=60>>60
He needs to average 6 hits a game because 60 / 10 = <<60/10=6>>6
#### 6

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 50, not 60. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
